page.title: 03GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: HIDE AND SEEK A GAME WE PLAY AT SCHOOL IS 'HIDE AND SEEK'. THE PEOPLE WHO ARE PLAYING GO AND HIDE AND ONE STAYS AT A WALL AND COUNTS UP TO TEN WITH THEIR EYES CLOSED. AFTER HE OR SHE HAS COUNTED THE PERSON AT THE WALL GOES AND LOOKS FOR THE PEOPLE WHO HAVE GONE TO HIDE AND WHEN THEY HAVE BEEN FOUND THEY RACE BACK TO THE WALL TO TRY TO TOUCH IT FIRST. THE LAST ONE TO TOUCH IS 'ON'. THE RULES ARE THAT THE PERSON COUNTING HAS NOT GOT TO LOOK WHERE THE OTHER PEOPLE ARE HIDING WHILST COUNTING OR THEY WILL KNOW WHERE THEY HAVE GONE. SHARRON CARTER. {
